reviewText: If you want a concise history of the monster "Killer B's" and how they earned the name, this is it! When you see how the crowds lined the courses, you know why tragedy struck.
Good DVD on Group B racing but vastly exceeded by Still Too Fast to Race. There is considerable overlap between the two. Get the latter. It is a superb review of this fabulous racing.

A nice recap of the hey-day of international rallying. Lots of good footage of the Audi Quattro, Lancia Delta, Lancia Stratos and the Peugeot 205 T16. Also has some interesting information on the lesser-known road-racing Group B cars like the Ferrari 288 GTO.
